# Distributed Tracing with Jaeger

## Access Jaeger UI
**URL**: http://localhost:16686

## Quick Links
- [Jaeger UI](http://localhost:16686)
- [Grafana Explore with Jaeger](http://localhost:3000/explore?orgId=1&left=%5B%22now-1h%22,%22now%22,%22Jaeger%22,%7B%7D%5D)

## Services Available
- api-gateway
- user-service
- device-service
- app-service
- billing-service
- notification-service
- proxy-service
- sms-receive-service

## Usage
1. Select a service from the dropdown
2. Click "Find Traces" to see recent traces
3. Click on a trace to see the full span tree
4. Analyze latency and error propagation
